localize.description: 錄製屏幕或網絡攝像頭，並立即共享。無需安裝任何應用程序。只是超快的錄製和分享。即將添加直播功能。超快錄製，爲您的團隊、培訓、創建產品演示提供反饋。

previous.title:
I just got a bagel with cream cheese for $3.50.

Unbelievable. I remember when the dollar used to mean something.

localize.full_text:
我刚花3.5美元买了一个奶油芝士百吉饼。

难以置信。我记得当美元曾经有意义的时候。

我剛花3.5美元買了一個奶油芝士百吉餅。

難以置信。我記得當美元曾經有意義的時候。

next.excerpt: How colorful was your Instagram in 2020? Get an interactive report about the most prominent colors you've shared in your posts throughout the year. Discover your personal or brand palette or reconnect with your most colourful experiences. Now on iOS & Android.
next.title: Year of Colour 2020 - Find out which colours you most used on Instagram this year
